item.title: DABDA
item.description: from https://twitter.com/cryptoismyjam/status/1548114053247012865 1/ The future of our funds is in limbo. The company that told us “Banks are Not Your Friends” & “Unbank Yourself” violated our trust in a most egregious manner. We are sad. Angry. Brokenhearted. Here are the 5 Stages of Grief (DABDA) according to a Celsian 1/ 我们的基金前途未卜。 告诉我们“银行不是你
